value.title: Amazon announces Graviton3 processors for AI inferencing
value.excerpt: Invent 2021 conference, Amazon announced Graviton3, the latest generation of its cloud-hosted AI inferencing chips.

value.title: Samsung brings three automotive chips for 5G, infotainment. Read details
value.excerpt: Samsung has introduced three of its latest automotive chip solutions; the Exynos Auto T5123 for 5G connectivity, the Exynos Auto V7 for in-vehicle infotainment systems and the ASIL-B certified S2VPS01 power management IC (PMIC) for the Auto V series.

value.title: AWS rolls out Graviton2-powered EC2 instances for GPU-based workloads
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services on Monday said it's bringing a new set of EC2 instances into general availability, including Graviton2-based instances designed for GPU-based workloads. Along with Amazon's custom-designed Graviton2 chip,

value.title: Coolpad Cool 20 Pro teaser poster confirms the MediaTek Dimensity 900 5G chip
value.excerpt: Chinese smartphone maker Coolpad is expected to release the COOL 20 Pro smartphone on December 1. The company had earlier released a teaser poster which gave us a look at the design of the sleek smartphone.

value.title: How the public clouds are innovating on AI
value.excerpt: Companies without the resources to develop in-house machine learning models are turning to the big cloud providers.

value.title: AI Robotics alongside us today
value.excerpt: From a young age, my fascination with how our world works drove me to imagine machines that make our everyday lives more enjoyable. Robots working alongside humans to manage day-to-day mundane tasks was a world I wanted to help create.

value.title: Design of AI may change with the open-source Apache TVM and a little help from startup OctoML
value.excerpt: Optimizing the compute graph of neural nets for new hardware may change even the training of neural nets, says startup OctoML.

value.title: MediaTek fixes vulnerability on its chips allowing certain apps to listen users

value.title: Security flaws identified in MediaTek smartphone chips: Check Point Research
value.excerpt: Check Point Research (CPR) has identified security flaws in the smartphone chip made by Taiwanese manufacturer MediaTek. Found in 37 per cent of the world’s smartphones, MediaTek’s chip serves as the main processor for nearly every notable Android device,

value.title: MediaTek chips had faced a vulnerability that allowed apps to eavesdrop on users
value.excerpt: Earlier today (25th November 2021), a vulnerability was spotted in the AI and audio processing components in recently launched MediaTek chipsets. This vulnerability would’ve allowed apps to eavesdrop on users.

value.title: The shape of edge AI to come
value.excerpt: Making chips work in this new world of edge AI requires new ways of setting up neurals, designing memory paths, and compiling to hardware.

value.title: Samsung to spend $17 billion to build new chip plant in the US

value.title: AI Tech: Top 5 AI Chips That Made It to The Market in 2021
value.excerpt: There has been immense growth in the domain of artificial intelligence and machine learning. Thus, more developed AI chips and hardware are being formulated and released to match the processing abilities of complex neural networks.

value.title: MediaTek's unveils Pentonic 2000, World's first 7nm TV chip, decodes 8K@120Hz
value.excerpt: Following the release of its flagship Dimensity 9000 SoC for smartphones, the company is now releasing its flagship TV chipset, the Pentonic 2000.

value.title: MediaTek's Pentonic 2000 is the world's first 7nm TV chip, decodes 8K@120Hz
value.excerpt: After announcing its flagship Dimensity 9000 SoC for smartphones, the company is now announcing its flagship TV chipset - the Pentonic 2000. And it appears that this silicon is the world's first in many aspects.

value.title: China unleashes might of AI on next-generation supercomputer to meet demand for more power
value.excerpt: Supercomputer recorded a 75,839-fold boost in handling data for machine learning after a breakthrough in memory management.

value.title: MediaTek unveils Pentonic 2000 chip for next-level 8K 120Hz TV viewing experience
value.excerpt: MediaTek today lifted the curtains on its new Pentonic smart TV family of processors with the introduction of the Pentonic 2000 chip.

value.title: Jensen Huang gets chip industry’s highest honor 28 years after founding Nvidia
value.excerpt: About 38 years after he started Nvidia, CEO Jensen Huang received the chip industry's highest honor, the Robert N. Noyce Award.

value.title: MediaTek announces new Filogic 130 series chips: will bring Wi-Fi 6 & Bluetooth 5.2 to IoT devices
value.excerpt: MediaTek has announced new Filogic 130 and Filogic 130A single-chip solutions to bring Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity to IoT devices.

value.title: MediaTek leaps into flagship phones with cutting-edge 4nm Dimensity 9000 chip
value.excerpt: The Dimensity 9000 is MediaTek's first true flagship phone processor, and the world's first built using a 4nm process. The company talked to us about it.

value.title: Nvidia Crypto Mining Chip Sales Drop 60%, Overall Revenue Growth Strong
value.excerpt: Nvidia has released its financial results for the third quarter of the 2022 fiscal year. While overall revenue has grown considerably, the sales of its 'Cryptocurrency Mining Processors' have experienced a sharp decline.

value.title: sureCore designs multi-port memory for Semidynamics AI chip

value.title: Advanced Verification: Unlocking the Door to a New Era of AI Chips
value.excerpt: A look at how chip manufacturers will have to adjust hardware architecture in order to accommodate ever-growing demand for increased AI functionality.

value.title: Nvidia CEO: Supply chain mess 'was a wake-up call for everybody'
value.excerpt: Nvidia said it has enough supply of its own chips to meet demand, but companies should "be more mindful about not taking the supply chain for granted."
